name: Trello theme: white board with colored header
description: White (light gray) board, with a black bar for shared Trello links, and a colored bar for the board header. The header color (green in the screenshot) is defined by the board's background color set by you.
additional_info:
To change the header color: on your Trello board, click Show menu > Change background, choose your color.

See my other Trello styles for extra modifications: show label text, shrink "New list" button, etc.
